name: Toddler Room
description: Program for children 18 months to 2 years 8 months, through hands-on activities that develop independence, language, and motor skills in a carefully-prepared environment designed for their developmental needs.
fullDescription: Program for children 18 months to 2 years 8 months, through hands-on activities that develop independence, language, and motor skills in a carefully-prepared environment designed for their developmental needs.
whatTheyOffer: Program for children 18 months to 2 years 8 months, through hands-on activities that develop independence, language, and motor skills in a carefully-prepared environment designed for their developmental needs.
howToGetIt: First set up a parent/child visit. Then fill out an application.
cost: This is a fee based service
